message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $8500. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $9500?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9000? I'm willing to make a serious offer
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still a bit away from meeting your budget. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $9800?
I'm getting close, but I still need to make some adjustments. Would you be willing to meet me at $9200? I'm willing to make a serious offer
I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. How about we meet at $10000?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500? I'm willing to make a serious offer

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we might not meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. How about we meet at $10500?

I'm still not comfortable with the price. I think we're getting too far away from my original budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. How about we meet at $10250? I'm willing to make a serious offer
